comment._content: What a lovely image! They look very relaxed. -- Seen in my contacts' photos. (?)

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content:
On this night, 27 February 1960, Dawn Fraser broke two world records in North Sydney Olympic Pool, having broken two there only a week before on the 20th. Ilsa Konrads had broken world records there in previous years.
Source: North Sydney Olympic Pool website
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
